keys: téléphone de cellules. Plan de leçon

resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1037</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cellphone Etiquette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cellphone Etikette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étiquette de Cellphone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Etiquette De Cellphone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Etiquette Di Cellphone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εθιμοτυπία Cellphone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Etiqueta de Cellphone</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners will learn about cellphone etiquette and conduct a survey of classmates, teachers and other adults to see who has the best cellphone etiquette.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">survey</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell phone . Lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">etiquette</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger erlernen über cellphone Etikette und 
leiten eine Übersicht der Mitschüler, der Lehrer und anderer 
Erwachsener, um zu sehen, wem die beste cellphone Etikette hat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants se renseigneront sur l'étiquette 
de cellphone et conduiront une étude des camarades de classe, des 
professeurs et d'autres adultes pour voir qui a la meilleure 
étiquette de cellphone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners aprenderão sobre o etiquette do 
cellphone e conduzirão um exame dos classmates, dos professores e dos
outros adultos para ver quem tem o mais melhor etiquette do cellphone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti impareranno circa etiquette di 
cellphone ed eseguiranno un'indagine dei classmates, degli insegnanti 
e di altri adulti per vedere chi ha il etiquette di cellphone 
migliore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι θα μάθουν για την εθιμοτυπία cellphone 
και θα πραγματοποιήσουν μια έρευνα για τους συμμαθητές, τους 
δασκάλους και άλλους ενηλίκους για να δουν ποιος έχει 
την καλύτερη εθιμοτυπία cellphone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes aprenderán sobre etiqueta 
del cellphone y conducirán una encuesta de classmates, de profesores 
y de otros adultos para ver quién tiene la mejor etiqueta del 
cellphone.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übersicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zelle Telefon. Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kommunikation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Etikette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
